gov.nasa.jpf.util

Class LocationSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpf.util.LocationSpec

  • public class LocationSpec
extends Object
    support for specification of source locations This maps sourcefile:line1-range strings into instructions that can be efficiently checked for by listeners. Example formats are: X.java (the whole of file X.java) MyClass.java:42 (file MyClass.java, line1 42) FooBar.java:42-48 (file FooBar.java, lines 42 to 48) FooBar.java:42+3 (range of lines from 42 to 45) x/y/z/whatever:42+ (file with pathname x/y/z/whatever, lines 42 to end) NOTE path names are given in Unix notation, to avoid the usual Java string quoting problem with backslashes
